content: On June 26, 1972, the Atlanta Braves faced off against the New York Mets in a thrilling game that showcased the brilliance of pitcher Phil Niekro. Niekro threw a complete game, allowing only one run and striking out 10 batters, leading the Braves to a 6-1 victory. This performance highlighted Niekro's exceptional talent and solidified his status as one of the premier knuckleball pitchers in baseball history.
